response.overview: Kim is willing brush aside the red flags when Freddy, her old crush, follows her home from the grocery store. Thanks to the miracle of a new, injectable weight-loss drug, attention from men is a new, and enjoyable phenomenon, and he IS awfully cute. Before long, they're heading upstairs together. But late in the night, the drugs reveal an unpleasant side-effect, and Kim has more than one secret hidden in her house.
response.title: As a Rake
